trans-unit.source: Marks an interface as a local service interface.
trans-unit.target: 將介面標記為本機服務介面。

trans-unit.source: A class that implements a local service interface must be added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService> and can be used by <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: 實作本機服務介面的類別必須加入至 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>，且可由 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> 使用。

trans-unit.source: Events on interfaces that are attributed with <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute> should have event data that derive from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 在以 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute> 屬性化之介面上的事件，應有衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs> 的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: While generic types are supported for interface method and event declarations, generic types are not supported for the interface declaration itself.
trans-unit.target: 在支援介面方法和事件宣告的泛型型別時，不支援介面宣告本身的泛型型別。

trans-unit.source: The following interface would not be valid for use as an `ExternalDataExchange`.
trans-unit.target: 下面介面不可做為 `ExternalDataExchange` 的有效介面。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute> on an interface.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何在介面上設定 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the ActiveDirectoryRoles SDK sample from the IStartPurchaseOrder.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 IStartPurchaseOrder.cs 檔案中＜ActiveDirectory 角色 SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute" /> 的新執行個體。
